page.syntax: Position as N = at2(C sub_string ,C string [,N starting_position ])

argument.name: Position
argument.description: The location of the string + Starting_Position - 1.

argument.name: string
argument.description: The character string to examine for occurrences of Find_String.

argument.name: starting_position
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1. The position in the string from which to start searching. Numeric

page.discussion: AT2() returns a position integer indicating where the sub_string begins in the string. Case sensitive. Use this function for incremental searches through a buffer. The sub_string argument is case sensitive.
